events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit well and I would like my money back.
The customer's issue has been categorized under Refund due to their request for money back on a purchased product.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah L. to assist with the refund request for the jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I'm Sarah, and I'll be helping you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason you want to return the jacket so I can process your refund?
Sure, the order number is 789654321. The jacket is too small and doesn't zip up properly, so I can't use it.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund request. You will receive an email with the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and the instructions. I appreciate how fast you're handling this refund process.
The refund process has been completed successfully. Please check your email for confirmation and the return instructions.
We are following up to ensure that your refund has been received and that you are satisfied with the resolution provided.
As there has been no further response, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us and have a great day.
We have sent you a brief survey to gather your feedback regarding your experience with our customer service.
